description:
This course is the basic fundament for you who want to learn the Norwegian language. You will learn the alphabet and the vowels, and how to pronounce the letters.

Together we practice the pronunciation of the letters, and especially the vowels, so at the end of the course you will be able to have a fluent pronunciation of the Norwegian letters.

This is the first step to learn Norwegian!

Either you plan to visit Norway as a tourist, or you plan to live here permanently, or may be you are just interested in learning a new language, this course is your introduction to the Norwegian language.

  • The course consists of video, audio, document, text, practice and quiz.
  • Has 12Â lectures, and more than an hour of content when you follow the lectures and do repeat and practice.
  • Is the first step in the process of learning the Norwegian language.
  • Give you practice in getting the pronunciation correct from the start.
  • Cover the special Norwegian vowels
title: Learn The Norwegian Language-basics
